summary:
Professional, highly qualified Civil work Engineer in Rollout, Operation, and maintenance for 2G and 3G & LTE Mobile networks, with Project experience build since 2005; within several countries, for several operators, dealing with different vendors, and latest technologies with excellent organizational and team working skills. Ideal candidate for position requiring drive,
initiative, responsibility, and challenge.

profile_positions.description:
•	Management of the Projects enhancement, retrofitting and site repair
•	Management for Project roads for the roll -out (Shalateen-AlAlameen)
•	Management for the security Projects
•	Follow up on all phases of the projects
•	Monitor contractors and quality of work
•	Checking the store & Material availability (Poles, MW Bracket, GSM antenna, RRU Bracket)
•	Follow up the project expenses at all stages and costs
•	Making the POC and follow the invoicing
•	Interfacing with customer 
•	Provide daily & weekly report to Operations Managing Director
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Checking the civil work quality in all structure types of sites (Rooftop, Greenfield, Monopole) 
•	Follow up the new site’s rollout progress.
•	Checking the snag list, BOQ, as build document & signing the acceptance certificate.
•	Attend a weekly meeting with the customer (Etisalat)
•	Raise the SLA of the site quality standard more than 95 %
•	Arrange the site access for the subcontractor to clear the site snags

•	Verify the site documentation for civil work
•	Attend the audit visit of the customer to the site
•	Provide technical support and guidance for field operations & Rollout team
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Planning, directing & coordinating the construction projects
•	Overseeing the entire construction project or part of a project
•	Scheduling & coordinating all types of design during the construction process
•	Selecting, hiring & overseeing work done by contractors
•	Overseeing the construction workers and their immediate supervisors
•	Ensuring that project is completed within a specified time
•	Determine the best resource of construction material
•	Responsible for scheduling & estimating the time required to complete the project Overseeing the selection of trade contractors & general contractors who are ideal for The completion of a project
•	Determine The labor requirements
•	Supervising & monitoring the hiring & firing of construction workers
•	Overseeing the performance of contractors (KPI)
•	Ensuring that the construction work is completed on schedule Monitoring & directing the progress in the Construction site Overseeing the delivery of material construction tools & equipment Ensuring that the construction resources are well used
•	Ensuring that all precautions are adhered to by the construction workers
•	Determine the target & achieving on monthly basis and raise reports on time
•	Follow up the QA/QC & HSE for all the projects
•	Following up with the Project Mangers Material request, weekly progress & reporting to the management
•	Controlling projects payment & Invoice with the finance department
•	Checking the store & Material availability
•	Costing-Quoting-Tendering for new projects
•	Supporting & working together with the Sales & Marketing Department to get a new
Projects
profile_positions.title: Construction Manager

profile_positions.description:
Checking the civil work quality in all types of sites (Rooftop, Greenfield, RDS, RDM and Temporary sites like COW, RDU, and BSS).
 Checking the site build quality as per Vodafone & Alcatel-Lucent standards. Follow up the new rollout site progress & prepare a daily progress report.
 Checking the snag list, BOQ, as build document & signing the acceptance certificate.
Checking the quality of installation in IBS sites (civil & telecom) for Acceptance process
 Acceptance process for all type of towers (SST, Monopole, Guyed wires) Acceptance for fiber cable installation & power cable installation.
 Verify the site documentation for (CW, TI & LTE) and submitted to MS
The Main Key person for coordination between Vodafone Qatar & Ooredoo for the sites sharing and the acceptance process and specs
 Follow up the snag clearance rectification with the Sub contractor handover the site to the Managed Service department.
Managing & leading the implementation In-house teams
Review and monitor with planning team the full details program
Supervise a regular audit with the Acceptance manager according to the ISO/project quality plan regulations. Third party and the internal and external Audit
Represent Alcatel-Lucent on acceptance related issues towards the customer
Represent Vodafone on acceptance related issues towards Ooredoo (In sites Sharing Project More than 160 Sites)
Escalation of acceptance related issues that need management action or support outside the acceptance area.
Follow up on all the snags rectification till the site is accepted from Vodafone MS (CW, TI& LTE)
Reviewing the BOQ for every site as per the as built done..
Monthly evaluation for the S.C. and the team
Manage & oversee the HSE Plan & Project Safety Program to be complimentary to the general codes of HSE practices and manual.
Communicating with all project departments (contract, quality, Engineering, etc.) in order to achieve correct documentation to close the project
profile_positions.title: Acceptance Engineer-Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
Clarify the Scope of Civil Work with the Subcontractor. Managing & audit the subcontractor during the daily work.
 Create the acceptance snag list for the Subcontractor. Sign the acceptance certificate for the subcontractor.
Responsible for the site maintenance against forecasted plan, targeted yearly and monthly to cater for Vodafone capacity growth in the network.
 Managing Civil Work activities & Subcontractors for Micro, Macro & BSC sites.
 General coordination between varies divisions of the department of Vodafone Egypt Rollout, warehouse, logistics, sites access & acceptance teams and attending a weekly meeting in order to discuss the achievements verses the set target & the performance.
 Sites enhancement works process activities.
 Manage & Audit for all work activities.
 Civil maintenance of VFE network sites.
 Civil Repair Works Supervision.
 Civil Work Project Management, Planning and coordination for projects Such as: (equipment Room protection to minimize intruders’ access and vandalism – BTS Total renovation or relocation
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Huawei Egypt
* Site Survey before construction.
* Responsible for the Civil, Electrical, Rigging & Earthing works of all types of sites (Roof top,
Greenfield & Micro Sites).
* Lead and guide a team of supervisors & technicians.
* Ensure compliance with design and contract documents. Provide technical support according
to specification.
* Follow up the Rollout of new Sites.
* Control the safety and technical measures set by the client in tower erection.
* Manage Subcontractor teams on daily basis.
* Check site quality for civil work & prepare site for telecom installation.
* Check Site BOQ & As built document.
* Create & review quality control manual for new sites.
* Install, check Alarms in BSC sites.
* Responsible for all site activities during the site establishment, execution and conclusion
phase.
* Handover the new rollout sites to the Managed service team.
Accomplishments
* Participate in Etisalat Rollout Project North region –Alexandria (70 sites).
* Participate in Etisalat Rollout Project East region – Sinai (90 sites).
profile_positions.title: Civil Work Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all the construction work in the projects.
* Scheduling and arranging the needed material in the projects.
* Supervise the civil work and labors according to the site needs.
* Deliver the civil work to the quality control department according to the project specs.
* Planning and scheduling the resources and material to the site.
* Planning and scheduling the civil activities due the projects needs.
* Responsible for the quantity survey for the material in the projects.
Accomplishments
* Cargo Village – New Terminal Cairo International Airport Project.
* Pile Project – Alexandria port Project.
* 8 New buildings – 11 floors – Bitcho American Project.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineer
